code: import React from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import play_icon from'../../assets/icons8-play-button-30.png';import pause_icon from'../../assets/pause.png';import arrow_btn from'../../assets/right-arrow (1).png';import'./Hero.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Hero=_ref=>{let{setPlayStatus,heroData,heroCount,setHeroCount,playStatus}=_ref;const navigate=useNavigate();const handleExploreClick=()=>{navigate("/login");};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"hero",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"hero-text",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:heroData[heroCount].text1}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:heroData[heroCount].text2})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"hero-explore",onClick:handleExploreClick,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Explore features"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"explore-arrow",src:arrow_btn,alt:"Explore features"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"hero-dot-play",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ul",{className:"hero-dots",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{onClick:()=>setHeroCount(0),className:heroCount===0?"hero-dot-orange":"hero-dot"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{onClick:()=>setHeroCount(1),className:heroCount===1?"hero-dot-orange":"hero-dot"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{onClick:()=>setHeroCount(2),className:heroCount===2?"hero-dot-orange":"hero-dot"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"hero-play",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{onClick:()=>setPlayStatus(!playStatus),src:playStatus?pause_icon:play_icon,alt:"Play/Pause"})})]})]});};export default Hero;
